## CMA Map - Display All Properties with Auto-Generated Polygon Boundary

Update the CMA map to show all comparable properties with price markers and automatically draw a polygon boundary around them (like a convex hull).

---

## Visual Goal

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚                                                                 â”‚
â”‚        â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”              â”‚
â”‚       /  $495K        $550K           $385K      \             â”‚
â”‚      /                                            \            â”‚
â”‚     /     $370K    $3.4M    $575K                  \           â”‚
â”‚    â”‚                                                â”‚          â”‚
â”‚    â”‚  ğŸ”µ SUBJECT     $6.97M                        â”‚          â”‚
â”‚    â”‚    $435K                     $329K            â”‚          â”‚
â”‚    â”‚                                                â”‚          â”‚
â”‚     \    $870K    $1000K     $550K                 /           â”‚
â”‚      \                                            /            â”‚
â”‚       \      $1.2M        $562K    $347K        /              â”‚
â”‚        â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜              â”‚
â”‚                                                                 â”‚
â”‚  [Legend: ğŸ”µ Subject  ğŸŸ¢ Active  ğŸ”´ Sold]                      â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

- All comparable properties shown as green price markers
- Subject property shown as blue marker
- Auto-generated polygon boundary encompasses all properties
- Polygon has semi-transparent fill with border

---

## Implementation

### CMA Map Component with Auto Polygon

```tsx
// components/cma-map.tsx
import { useEffect, useRef, useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import mapboxgl from 'mapbox-gl';
import 'mapbox-gl/dist/mapbox-gl.css';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { X, Locate, Maximize2 } from 'lucide-react';

interface CMAMapProps {
  properties: any[];
  subjectProperty?: any;
  showPolygon?: boolean;
}

export function CMAMap({ properties, subjectProperty, showPolygon = true }: CMAMapProps) {
  const mapContainer = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
  const map = useRef<mapboxgl.Map | null>(null);
  const markersRef = useRef<mapboxgl.Marker[]>([]);
  const [selectedProperty, setSelectedProperty] = useState<any>(null);
  const [mapLoaded, setMapLoaded] = useState(false);

  // Calculate convex hull polygon from all property coordinates
  const polygonCoordinates = useMemo(() => {
    const coords: [number, number][] = [];
    
    // Add subject property
    if (subjectProperty?.map?.latitude && subjectProperty?.map?.longitude) {
      coords.push([subjectProperty.map.longitude, subjectProperty.map.latitude]);
    }
    
    // Add all comparable properties
    properties.forEach(p => {
      if (p.map?.latitude && p.map?.longitude) {
        coords.push([p.map.longitude, p.map.latitude]);
      }
    });
    
    if (coords.length < 3) return null;
    
    // Calculate convex hull
    return calculateConvexHull(coords);
  }, [properties, subjectProperty]);

  // Initialize map
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!mapContainer.current || map.current) return;

    mapboxgl.accessToken = import.meta.env.VITE_MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN || '';

    // Calculate center
    const allCoords = [
      ...(subjectProperty?.map ? [[subjectProperty.map.longitude, subjectProperty.map.latitude]] : []),
      ...properties.filter(p => p.map?.latitude).map(p => [p.map.longitude, p.map.latitude])
    ];
    
    const centerLng = allCoords.length > 0 
      ? allCoords.reduce((sum, c) => sum + c[0], 0) / allCoords.length 
      : -97.7431;
    const centerLat = allCoords.length > 0 
      ? allCoords.reduce((sum, c) => sum + c[1], 0) / allCoords.length 
      : 30.2672;

    map.current = new mapboxgl.Map({
      container: mapContainer.current,
      style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/streets-v12',
      center: [centerLng, centerLat],
      zoom: 11,
    });

    map.current.addControl(new mapboxgl.NavigationControl(), 'top-right');

    map.current.on('load', () => {
      setMapLoaded(true);
    });

    return () => {
      markersRef.current.forEach(m => m.remove());
      markersRef.current = [];
      map.current?.remove();
      map.current = null;
    };
  }, []);

  // Update map when data changes
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!map.current || !mapLoaded) return;

    // Clear existing markers
    markersRef.current.forEach(m => m.remove());
    markersRef.current = [];

    // Add polygon boundary
    if (showPolygon && polygonCoordinates) {
      addPolygonBoundary(polygonCoordinates);
    }

    // Add subject marker
    if (subjectProperty?.map?.latitude && subjectProperty?.map?.longitude) {
      addSubjectMarker();
    }

    // Add all comparable markers
    properties.forEach(property => {
      addPropertyMarker(property);
    });

    // Fit bounds to show all
    fitBounds();
  }, [properties, subjectProperty, mapLoaded, polygonCoordinates, showPolygon]);

  // Add polygon boundary layer
  const addPolygonBoundary = (coordinates: [number, number][]) => {
    if (!map.current) return;

    // Remove existing polygon layers
    if (map.current.getLayer('cma-polygon-fill')) {
      map.current.removeLayer('cma-polygon-fill');
      map.current.removeLayer('cma-polygon-line');
      map.current.removeSource('cma-polygon');
    }

    // Close the polygon
    const closedCoords = [...coordinates, coordinates[0]];

    map.current.addSource('cma-polygon', {
      type: 'geojson',
      data: {
        type: 'Feature',
        properties: {},
        geometry: {
          type: 'Polygon',
          coordinates: [closedCoords],
        },
      },
    });

    // Semi-transparent fill (like the blue in the screenshot)
    map.current.addLayer({
      id: 'cma-polygon-fill',
      type: 'fill',
      source: 'cma-polygon',
      paint: {
        'fill-color': '#3b82f6', // Blue
        'fill-opacity': 0.15,
      },
    });

    // Border line
    map.current.addLayer({
      id: 'cma-polygon-line',
      type: 'line',
      source: 'cma-polygon',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#2563eb', // Darker blue
        'line-width': 3,
        'line-opacity': 0.8,
      },
    });
  };

  // Add subject property marker
  const addSubjectMarker = () => {
    if (!map.current || !subjectProperty) return;

    const { latitude, longitude } = subjectProperty.map || {};
    if (!latitude || !longitude) return;

    const price = subjectProperty.listPrice || 0;
    const priceLabel = formatPrice(price);

    const el = document.createElement('div');
    el.innerHTML = `
      <div style="
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2563eb 0%, #1e40af 100%);
        color: white;
        padding: 6px 12px;
        border-radius: 6px;
        font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 13px;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.5);
        white-space: nowrap;
        border: 2px solid white;
        cursor: pointer;
        position: relative;
      ">
        <div style="font-size: 9px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.5px; opacity: 0.9; margin-bottom: 1px;">Subject</div>
        ${priceLabel}
        <div style="
          position: absolute;
          bottom: -8px;
          left: 50%;
          transform: translateX(-50%);
          width: 0;
          height: 0;
          border-left: 8px solid transparent;
          border-right: 8px solid transparent;
          border-top: 8px solid #1e40af;
        "></div>
      </div>
    `;

    el.addEventListener('click', () => setSelectedProperty({ ...subjectProperty, isSubject: true }));

    const marker = new mapboxgl.Marker({ element: el, anchor: 'bottom' })
      .setLngLat([longitude, latitude])
      .addTo(map.current);

    markersRef.current.push(marker);
  };

  // Add comparable property marker
  const addPropertyMarker = (property: any) => {
    if (!map.current) return;

    const { latitude, longitude } = property.map || {};
    if (!latitude || !longitude) return;

    const status = (property.status || '').toLowerCase();
    const isSold = status.includes('sold') || status.includes('closed');
    const price = isSold 
      ? (property.soldPrice || property.closePrice || property.listPrice || 0)
      : (property.listPrice || 0);
    const priceLabel = formatPrice(price);

    // Colors based on status
    const bgColor = isSold ? '#dc2626' : '#16a34a'; // Red for sold, Green for active
    const shadowColor = isSold ? 'rgba(220, 38, 38, 0.4)' : 'rgba(22, 163, 74, 0.4)';

    const el = document.createElement('div');
    el.innerHTML = `
      <div style="
        background: ${bgColor};
        color: white;
        padding: 4px 8px;
        border-radius: 4px;
        font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px ${shadowColor};
        white-space: nowrap;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: transform 0.15s, box-shadow 0.15s;
        border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
      " 
      onmouseover="this.style.transform='scale(1.1)'; this.style.boxShadow='0 4px 12px ${shadowColor}';"
      onmouseout="this.style.transform='scale(1)'; this.style.boxShadow='0 2px 8px ${shadowColor}';"
      >
        ${priceLabel}
      </div>
    `;

    el.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      e.stopPropagation();
      setSelectedProperty(property);
    });

    const marker = new mapboxgl.Marker({ element: el, anchor: 'bottom' })
      .setLngLat([longitude, latitude])
      .addTo(map.current);

    markersRef.current.push(marker);
  };

  // Fit map to show all markers
  const fitBounds = () => {
    if (!map.current) return;

    const coords: [number, number][] = [];

    if (subjectProperty?.map?.longitude && subjectProperty?.map?.latitude) {
      coords.push([subjectProperty.map.longitude, subjectProperty.map.latitude]);
    }

    properties.forEach(p => {
      if (p.map?.longitude && p.map?.latitude) {
        coords.push([p.map.longitude, p.map.latitude]);
      }
    });

    if (coords.length === 0) return;

    if (coords.length === 1) {
      map.current.setCenter(coords[0]);
      map.current.setZoom(14);
      return;
    }

    const bounds = coords.reduce(
      (bounds, coord) => bounds.extend(coord),
      new mapboxgl.LngLatBounds(coords[0], coords[0])
    );

    map.current.fitBounds(bounds, {
      padding: 60,
      maxZoom: 14,
      duration: 1000,
    });
  };

  const centerOnSubject = () => {
    if (!map.current || !subjectProperty?.map) return;
    map.current.flyTo({
      center: [subjectProperty.map.longitude, subjectProperty.map.latitude],
      zoom: 14,
    });
  };

  return (
    <div className="relative w-full h-[550px] rounded-lg overflow-hidden border bg-gray-100">
      <div ref={mapContainer} className="w-full h-full" />

      {/* Controls */}
      <div className="absolute top-4 left-4 flex flex-col gap-2">
        <Button
          size="icon"
          variant="secondary"
          className="h-8 w-8 shadow-md"
          onClick={centerOnSubject}
          title="Center on subject"
        >
          <Locate className="h-4 w-4" />
        </Button>
        <Button
          size="icon"
          variant="secondary"
          className="h-8 w-8 shadow-md"
          onClick={fitBounds}
          title="Fit all properties"
        >
          <Maximize2 className="h-4 w-4" />
        </Button>
      </div>

      {/* Property count */}
      <div className="absolute top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2">
        <Badge variant="secondary" className="shadow-md bg-white">
          {properties.length} comparable{properties.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''} + Subject
        </Badge>
      </div>

      {/* Legend */}
      <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-4 bg-white/95 backdrop-blur rounded-lg p-3 shadow-lg">
        <p className="text-xs font-semibold mb-2">Legend</p>
        <div className="space-y-1.5">
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <div className="w-4 h-3 rounded bg-blue-600 border border-white shadow"></div>
            <span className="text-xs">Subject Property</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <div className="w-4 h-3 rounded bg-green-600"></div>
            <span className="text-xs">Active Listing</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <div className="w-4 h-3 rounded bg-red-600"></div>
            <span className="text-xs">Sold</span>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mt-2 pt-2 border-t">
            <div className="w-4 h-3 rounded bg-blue-500/20 border-2 border-blue-500"></div>
            <span className="text-xs">Search Area</span>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Selected property popup */}
      {selectedProperty && (
        <PropertyPopup
          property={selectedProperty}
          onClose={() => setSelectedProperty(null)}
        />
      )}

      {/* Loading */}
      {!mapLoaded && (
        <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-100">
          <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-8 w-8 border-b-2 border-blue-600"></div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

// Property popup component
function PropertyPopup({ property, onClose }: { property: any; onClose: () => void }) {
  const status = (property.status || '').toLowerCase();
  const isSold = status.includes('sold') || status.includes('closed');
  const isSubject = property.isSubject;
  const price = isSold
    ? (property.soldPrice || property.closePrice || property.listPrice || 0)
    : (property.listPrice || 0);

  return (
    <div className="absolute top-4 right-4 w-80 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-2xl overflow-hidden">
      <button
        className="absolute top-2 right-2 z-10 p-1.5 bg-white/90 hover:bg-white rounded-full shadow"
        onClick={onClose}
      >
        <X className="h-4 w-4" />
      </button>

      {property.images?.[0] && (
        <img
          src={property.images[0]}
          alt="Property"
          className="w-full h-32 object-cover"
        />
      )}

      <div className="p-4">
        <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-2">
          <Badge className={
            isSubject ? 'bg-blue-600' : isSold ? 'bg-red-500' : 'bg-green-500'
          }>
            {isSubject ? 'Subject' : isSold ? 'Sold' : 'Active'}
          </Badge>
          {property.simpleDaysOnMarket !== undefined && (
            <span className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">
              {property.simpleDaysOnMarket} DOM
            </span>
          )}
        </div>

        <p className="font-bold text-xl">${price.toLocaleString()}</p>
        <p className="text-sm text-gray-700 truncate">
          {property.address?.streetAddress || property.unparsedAddress}
        </p>
        <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground mb-3">
          {property.address?.city}, {property.address?.state}
        </p>

        <div className="flex gap-4 text-sm">
          <span><strong>{property.numBedrooms || property.details?.numBedrooms || 'â€”'}</strong> beds</span>
          <span><strong>{property.numBathrooms || property.details?.numBathrooms || 'â€”'}</strong> baths</span>
          <span><strong>{(property.sqft || property.details?.sqft)?.toLocaleString() || 'â€”'}</strong> sqft</span>
        </div>

        <div className="flex justify-between mt-3 pt-3 border-t text-xs text-muted-foreground">
          <span>Year: {property.yearBuilt || property.details?.yearBuilt || 'â€”'}</span>
          <span>${Math.round(price / (property.sqft || property.details?.sqft || 1))}/sqft</span>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Format price to K/M notation
function formatPrice(price: number): string {
  if (price >= 1000000) {
    const millions = price / 1000000;
    return millions % 1 === 0 ? `$${millions}M` : `$${millions.toFixed(2)}M`;
  }
  return `$${Math.round(price / 1000)}K`;
}

/**
 * Calculate convex hull using Graham scan algorithm
 * Returns array of [longitude, latitude] coordinates forming the hull
 */
function calculateConvexHull(points: [number, number][]): [number, number][] {
  if (points.length < 3) return points;

  // Find the bottom-most point (or left-most in case of tie)
  let start = 0;
  for (let i = 1; i < points.length; i++) {
    if (points[i][1] < points[start][1] ||
        (points[i][1] === points[start][1] && points[i][0] < points[start][0])) {
      start = i;
    }
  }

  // Swap start point to beginning
  [points[0], points[start]] = [points[start], points[0]];
  const pivot = points[0];

  // Sort points by polar angle with respect to pivot
  const sorted = points.slice(1).sort((a, b) => {
    const angleA = Math.atan2(a[1] - pivot[1], a[0] - pivot[0]);
    const angleB = Math.atan2(b[1] - pivot[1], b[0] - pivot[0]);
    if (angleA !== angleB) return angleA - angleB;
    // If same angle, closer point comes first
    const distA = (a[0] - pivot[0]) ** 2 + (a[1] - pivot[1]) ** 2;
    const distB = (b[0] - pivot[0]) ** 2 + (b[1] - pivot[1]) ** 2;
    return distA - distB;
  });

  // Build hull
  const hull: [number, number][] = [pivot];

  for (const point of sorted) {
    // Remove points that make clockwise turn
    while (hull.length > 1 && crossProduct(hull[hull.length - 2], hull[hull.length - 1], point) <= 0) {
      hull.pop();
    }
    hull.push(point);
  }

  return hull;
}

// Cross product to determine turn direction
function crossProduct(o: [number, number], a: [number, number], b: [number, number]): number {
  return (a[0] - o[0]) * (b[1] - o[1]) - (a[1] - o[1]) * (b[0] - o[0]);
}
```

---

## Alternative: Concave Hull (Tighter Boundary)

If you want a tighter boundary that follows the shape of the properties more closely (concave hull), you can use a library:

```bash
npm install concaveman
```

```typescript
import concaveman from 'concaveman';

function calculateConcaveHull(points: [number, number][]): [number, number][] {
  if (points.length < 3) return points;
  
  // concaveman expects [[x,y], [x,y], ...]
  // concavity: 2 = more detailed, Infinity = convex hull
  const hull = concaveman(points, 2, 0);
  
  return hull;
}
```

---

## Usage in CMA Tab

```tsx
// In cma-tab.tsx

{activeView === 'map' && (
  <CMAMap
    properties={comparables || []}
    subjectProperty={mlsData}
    showPolygon={true}  // Show the auto-generated boundary
  />
)}
```

---

## Visual Features

| Feature | Implementation |
|---------|----------------|
| Price markers | Green for active, Red for sold, Blue for subject |
| Price format | $347K, $1.2M, $6.97M (auto-formatted) |
| Polygon boundary | Blue semi-transparent fill with solid border |
| Auto-fit | Map automatically fits to show all properties |
| Click interaction | Shows property details popup |
| Hover effect | Markers scale up on hover |

---

## Summary

1. **All properties displayed** with price markers (green = active, red = sold)
2. **Subject property** shown with distinct blue marker labeled "Subject"
3. **Auto-generated polygon** boundary around all properties using convex hull algorithm
4. **Blue semi-transparent fill** with darker blue border (like the screenshot)
5. **Click any marker** to see property details
6. **Legend** shows what each color means
7. **Controls** to center on subject or fit all properties
